articles.title: Amb. Wendy Sherman: ‘Terrible reprisals’ could follow U.S. strike in Baghdad
articles.description: Amb. Wendy Sherman tells Lawrence O’Donnell that the Trump administration’s “one-off action” to launch a strike that killed the top Iranian revolutionary guard commander could have “unbelievably horrific consequences” for the United States.
articles.content: Amb. Wendy Sherman tells Lawrence ODonnell that the Trump administrations one-off action to launch a strike that killed the top Iranian revolutionary guard commander could have unbelievably horrific consequences for the United States.Jan. 3, 2020

articles.title: Iran accuses U.S. of 'international terrorism' after military leader's death
articles.description: Iran's foreign minister blasted the Trump administration after the Pentagon confirmed the president ordered the killing of the powerful leader of Iran's secretive Quds Force, Qassim Suleimani.

articles.title: 'Sleepless night': Dems worry after Trump killing of Iran military leader
articles.description: Democrats from the campaign trail to Capitol Hill respond after the Pentagon confirms the U.S. killed Iran's top military leader, Qassim Suleimani.

articles.title: Trump responds to U.S. strike killing Iran's military leader with a flag tweet
articles.description: After news broke that Iran's military leader died in Iraq, the first response from the U.S. government was a tweet of an American flag by the president. The Pentagon later confirmed the U.S. was behind the killing.

articles.title: Trump's Pentagon: U.S. killed Iran's military leader Qassem Soleimani
articles.description: Qassem Suleimani's death could dramatically increase tensions between the U.S. and Iran, which were already heightened by the New Year's attacks on the American Embassy compound.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: US strike on Suleimani 'extremely significant escalation' in US-Iran tensions
articles.description: NBC News Security Correspondent Courtney Kube explains the implications of a targeted US assassination of the top Iranian general, and how Iranians could coalesce and rally around the flag as a result.
